alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 15 at 2:48AM CST until January 17 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27. For the second Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 26 possible. * WHERE...Coastal Kleberg and Coastal Nueces Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 3 PM CST this afternoon. For the second Freeze Warning, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. For the Freeze Watch, from Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
